name: EGGO!
description:
EGGO is a Rogue like/Shoot them all , be ready to challenge yourself with a nervous, without mercy gameplay.    Make your own build  with a ton of items, and begin each game with procedural character and map! 

You're a little chimera send by an entity trapped in a statue body... This entity send you to release it from its tormentor, an alchimist which have bad ambitions. You begin in the foundation of his house....
